title: Market on Front
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, European, Fusion, Deli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A market and deli with eat-in and to-go for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Several rotating vegan deli items are usually available. Serves cold and hot sandwiches and salads. Several sandwiches can be made vegan. Ask the staff which sauces and breads are vegan. You can also enjoy one of their vegan sandwiches at the nearby Dram Shop.
